ComicInfo.Summary: Deadpool is returning from his bout with Loki and finds that the curse placed on him has replaced his regular scarred appearance with the good looks of Thom Cruz. The strange thing is, he misses his old appearance. But what he really misses is people leaving him alone, especially hysterical, shrieking women.
ComicInfo.Title: Johnny Handsome Scene One; Bullpen Bits #39; Fast Lane, Part 3 of 4: On the Edge
